name: Extreme
description: Extreme rules match with weapons and hardcore elements

name: Normal
description: Standard wrestling match with traditional rules

name: Over the Top Rope Elimination
description: Battle royal style elimination over the top rope

name: Submission
description: Match can only be won by submission

name: Promo
description: Non-wrestling promo segment for storyline development

name: Cage
description: Steel cage match with escape or pinfall victory

name: Last Man Standing
description: Match won by incapacitating opponent for 10-count

name: Free-For-All
description: Multi-person match with no teams or alliances

name: I Quit Match
description: Match won only when opponent says 'I Quit'

name: Ladder Match
description: Match with ladders to retrieve suspended object

name: Casket Match
description: Match won by placing opponent in a casket

name: Tables, Ladders and Chairs (TLC)
description: Extreme match featuring tables, ladders, and chairs

name: Barbwire Exploding Deathmatch

name: Gauntlet
description: One wrestler faces multiple opponents in succession
